Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Intestinal Diseases/Pneumatosis Cystoides Intestinalis
Record.Description: A condition characterized by the presence of multiple gas-filled cysts in the intestinal wall, the submucosa and/or subserosa of the INTESTINE. The majority of the cysts are found in the JEJUNUM and the ILEUM.
